Class BuildTWCore

java.lang.Object
  BuildTWCore

public class BuildTWCore
extends java.lang.Object

Tool for recursively compiling all or part of TWCore. In order for this utility to run properly, you must have your PATH variable set to the Java bin directory where javac is located, or manually set the binDir variable here.

Author:
Stefan / Mythrandir
